snippet: The man, an American citizen, expressed interest online in carrying out a deadly attack, law enforcement officials said.
abstract: Suburban Chicago man Adel Daoud, an American citizen, is arrested after attempting to detonate what he thought was a car bomb outside a Chicago bar; authorities say he has been under surveillance for months, and in multiple conversations with undercover agents expressed a desire to kill on a mass scale as revenge for what he believed was the persecution of Muslims by the United States.

byline.original: By MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ and MARC SANTORA

lead_paragraph: The man, an American citizen, expressed interest online in carrying out a deadly attack, law enforcement officials said.

headline.seo: Man Is Accused of Jihadist Plot to Bomb Chicago Bar
headline.main: Man Is Accused of Jihadist Plot to Bomb a Bar in Chicago
headline.print_headline: Chicago-Area Teenager Accused of Terrorism Plot
